# Analysis so this is an analysis. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} setwd('/home/emil/Dropbox/arbejde/cbs/phd/presentations/intra-org-inequality-budapest') source('/home/emil/Dropbox/data-science/R/.minimal-Rprofile') library(data.table) library(purrr) library(broom) library(dttools) library(knitr) library(kableExtra) library(readxl) library(fs) library(formattable) # dir_ls('input/models') # mod_ab0 = read_xlsx('input/models/modeloutput-block-A-B-AB-2.xlsx') |> data.table() # mod_ab0 = read_xlsx('input/models/modeloutput-block-AB-etable2.xlsx') |> data.table() mod_ab0 = read_xlsx('input/models/modeloutput-block-AB-etable.xlsx') |> data.table() setnames(mod_ab0, 1, 'term') # colc(mod_ab0) # mod_ab0$term thecols_coef_ctrl ='geo_west|alder|disco|heltid|privat|jobexp|n_arbnr' # mod_ab0[ term %!ilike% thecols_coef_ctrl, ][, .N, term] # mod_ab0[ term %ilike% thecols_coef_ctrl, ][, .N, term] mod_ab1 = mod_ab0[ term %!ilike% thecols_coef_ctrl, ] # also remove the one NA at the top (make sure there is only one) mod_ab1 = mod_ab1[!is.na(term) & term %!ilike% 'Dependent Var\\.:' ] # mod_ab1[is.na(term) | term %ilike% 'Dependent Var\\.:' ] dic_term = data.table( from=c( 'femaleTRUE', 'bin_noman_tie_maleTRUE', 'i(factor_var=female,var=bin_noman_tie_male,ref=FALSE)', 'bin_noman_tie_femaleTRUE', 'i(factor_var=female,var=bin_noman_tie_female,ref=FALSE)', 'bin_man_tie_maleTRUE', 'i(factor_var=female,var=bin_man_tie_male,ref=FALSE)', 'bin_man_tie_femaleTRUE', 'i(factor_var=female,var=bin_man_tie_female,ref=FALSE)' )) dic_term$to = c ( 'female', 'non-mgnr male tie', 'non-mgnr male tie * female', 'non-mgnr female tie', 'non-mgnr female tie * female', 'mgnr male tie', 'mgnr male tie * female', 'mgnr female tie', 'mgnr female tie * female' ) mod_ab1[dic_term, term := to, on=c(term='from')] setcolorder(mod_ab1, 'term') for(xcol in colc(mod_ab1, '', not='term')) set(mod_ab1, i=which(is.na(mod_ab1[[xcol]])), j=xcol, value='') mod_ab2 = copy(mod_ab1) # change '---' delimiters to less for( xcol in colc(mod_ab2)) { # no_underscores = rep( '_' , max(nchar( mod_abc [[xcol]] ), na.rm=T ) ) |> paste(collapse='') no_underscores = rep( '_' , 15 ) |> paste(collapse='') mod_ab2[get(xcol) %ilike% '_{3,}' , (xcol) := gsub('_{2,}', no_underscores, get(xcol))] mod_ab2[get(xcol) %ilike% '-{3,}' , (xcol) := gsub('-{2,}', no_underscores, get(xcol))][] } # mod_ab2 %>% kable('html') %>% kable_styling(bootstrap_options=qc(striped), position='left', fixed_thead=T) %>% kable_paper('hover', full_width=TRUE) # mod_ab2 %>% kable('html') %>% kable_styling( position='left', fixed_thead=T) %>% kable_paper('hover', full_width=TRUE) mod_ab2 %>% kable('html') %>% kable_styling( fixed_thead=T) %>% kable_paper('hover', full_width=TRUE) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
